conventions.rule: Commands are kebab-case .md files in commands/
Agents named yolo-{role}.md or yolo-{dept}-{role}.md in agents/
Scripts are kebab-case .sh files in scripts/
Commits follow {type}({scope}): {desc} format, one commit per task
Stage files individually with git add, never git add . or git add -A
Shell scripts use set -u minimum, set -euo pipefail for critical scripts
Use jq for all JSON parsing, never grep/sed on JSON
All hooks route through hook-wrapper.sh for graceful degradation
Zero-dependency design: no package.json, npm, or build step
All scripts target bash, not POSIX sh
Plugin cache resolution via ls | sort -V | tail -1, never glob expansion
